name: part_005
file: tmp_いつか吾輩もあの頃のインターネットって言われる日が来るのかな #ラプラス・バースデイ2025 [m8hqs4NMij4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: La+ Plus is sitting in a subway car, speaking to the camera and then shouting at the audience to keep watching.
Transition scene with visual effects and a spotlight appearing.
Performance of the song 'Amanojaku' in a large stadium setting.
La+ Plus and Ironmouse dancing in a white space to a song cover by Noriaki.

subtitles.original: 吾輩は...
もっと生きてんだよ！
subtitles.english: want to live more!

subtitles.original: おい！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: 最後までちゃんと見るって言って！
subtitles.english: Say you'll watch until the very end!

subtitles.original: 配信最後までちゃんと見るって言って！
subtitles.english: Say you'll watch the stream until the very end!

subtitles.original: あー！
subtitles.english: Aaaah!

subtitles.original: 僕がずっと前から思ってることを話そうか
subtitles.english: Shall I tell you what I've been thinking about for a long time?

subtitles.original: 友達に戻れたらこれ以上は望まないさ
subtitles.english: If we could go back to being friends, I wouldn't ask for anything more.

subtitles.original: 君がそれでいいなら僕だってそれで構わないさ
subtitles.english: If you're okay with that, then I'm okay with it too.

subtitles.original: 嘘つきの僕が吐いた反対言葉の愛のうた
subtitles.english: A love song of opposite words sung by a liar like me.

subtitles.original:
天ノ弱
作詞・作曲: 164
subtitles.english:
Amanojaku
Lyrics/Composition: 164

subtitles.original: 今日はとてもいい天気でした どしゃ降りになっていたんでした
subtitles.english: It was very nice weather today, it was a downpour.

subtitles.original: 昨日もずっと暇で 一日満喫してました
subtitles.english: I was free all day yesterday and enjoyed my day to the fullest.

subtitles.original: 別に君のことなんて 考えてなんていないさ
subtitles.english: It's not like I was thinking about you or anything.

subtitles.original: いやでもちょっと本当は 考えていたかもなんてね
subtitles.english: Well, maybe I actually was thinking about you a little, just kidding.

subtitles.original: メリーゴーランドみたいに回る 僕の頭ん中がもうグルグルさ
subtitles.english: Spinning like a merry-go-round, my head is already going round and round.

subtitles.original: この両手から零れそうなほど 君にもらった愛はどこに捨てよう？
subtitles.english: Where should I throw away the love I got from you that's overflowing from these hands?

subtitles.original: 限りのある消耗品なんて僕は いらないよ
subtitles.english: I don't need such limited consumables.

subtitles.original: 僕がずっと前から思ってることを話そうか
subtitles.english: Shall I tell you what I've been thinking about for a long time?

subtitles.original: 姿は見えないのに言葉だけ見えちゃってるんだ
subtitles.english: Even though I can't see your figure, I can see only your words.

subtitles.original: 僕が知らないことがあるだけで 気が狂いそうだ
subtitles.english: Just the thought that there are things I don't know makes me feel like I'm going crazy.

subtitles.original: ぶら下がった感情が綺麗なのか汚いのか
subtitles.english: Whether these dangling emotions are beautiful or ugly,

subtitles.original: 僕にはまだわからず 捨てるあてもないんだ
subtitles.english: I still don't know, and I have nowhere to throw them away.

subtitles.original: 言葉の裏の裏が見えるまで待つからさ
subtitles.english: I'll wait until I can see the back of the back of your words,

subtitles.original: 真っ暗な中じゃなきゃいけないじゃないか
subtitles.english: Because it has to be in pitch black, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 進む君と止まった僕の 縮まらない隙間を何で埋めよう？
subtitles.english: What should I fill the gap with that won't narrow between you who moves forward and me who stopped?

subtitles.original: まだ素直に言葉にできない僕は 天性の弱虫さ
subtitles.english: I, who still can't put my feelings honestly into words, am a natural coward.

subtitles.original: この両手から零れそうなほど 君に渡す愛を誰に譲ろう？
subtitles.english: To whom should I give the love I'm meant to give you that's overflowing from these hands?

subtitles.original: そんな所にも宛てがあるわけないから
subtitles.english: Because there's no way there's a destination for it there either.

subtitles.original: まだ 待つよ
subtitles.english: I'll still wait.

subtitles.original: もう いいかい
subtitles.english: Are you ready yet?

subtitles.original: のりあきさんが歌ってるｗ
subtitles.english: Noriaki-san is singing! lol

subtitles.original: あー...疲れた...
subtitles.english: Aaah... I'm tired...

subtitles.original:
気まぐれメルシィ
作詞: 八王子P/q*Left / 作曲: 八王子P
subtitles.english:
Kimagure Mercy
Lyrics: Hachioji-P/q*Left / Composition: Hachioji-P
